item.description:
I've only been to Maudslay a couple times, and it's been a while, so this will be exploratory in nature...bear with me as we find our way around the "main loop" oHedge Trail and connect to the Laurel Walk (on the main road) for a bit before continuing along the Merrimac River Trail.  Certainly if someone knows Maudslay well and has other suggestions, I'm open!!

I anticipate this being a fairly fast paced walk- planning to walk for 60-90 minutes.  Primarily packed sand/dirt, with some crushed gravel trails, and a few very short but steep inclines- otherwise very much a  level, very easy trail.  For safety purposes, this walk will only be held if there is enough firm, committed interest...if not, I'll cancel by early Sunday morning.

I look forward to seeing everyone...and friendly, leashed pooches (that you clean up after) are also welcomed!  Please note there will be a $1 fee collected from everyone to help Angela defray the cost of the meetup dues.  Also, there is a parking fee ($2 at the meter if I recall).
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the main lot across from the Visitors Center (a white house)...I drive a blue Pacifica with NY plates

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Sunday afternoon Maudslay Walk- come explore with me!
